objectives

	
	

		browser cache:

			https://web.dev/articles/http-cache

			https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Cache-Control

			etag:
				https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/ETag
				
			
				
			request:
				If-None-Match: W/"32f-ocZpOyPZZyg+7TCyJEV3si5izKM"
				
				
			responses:
				Etag: W/"32f-ocZpOyPZZyg+7TCyJEV3si5izKM"
				
				Cache-Control: 
					no-cache
						cache the response, but revalidate with the Etag
						for instance check for latest HTML
					
					no-store
					
					must-revalidate
						
						
					private
						can only be cached by the browser
						
					max-age
						max-age=60
							cache for 1 minute
